title: Olay Exfoliating Renewal Cleanser 6 Fl Oz
description: If you've been searching for an exfoliating cleanser that provides excellent results every day, there's no reason to look any further. Olay Professional Pro-X Exfoliating Renewal Cleanser is designed to purify and renew your skin's texture for a refreshed, smooth feel. Designed by Olay in conjunction with a team of renowned skincare experts, this exfoliating cleanser gently clears away make-up, oil and dirt, leaving your face clean, refreshed and primed for hydration. For more effective results, use it with the Pro-X Advanced Cleansing System, and let the proven power of advanced cleansing go to work.Boost your exfoliation and replace dull surface cells with younger, smoother-looking skin. Make Pro-X Exfoliating Renewal Cleanser part of your daily regimen, and reveal a brighter, more even skin.
